reviews.text: A hidden gem of tranquility and history with amazing Mountain Views nestled downtown.
One of our absolute favorite places locally. It is so beautiful year round with a wide variety of flowers/plants that grow throughout the year. The staff is also friendly and knowledgeable.

I really enjoy coming to this cemetery. Not just because of the wonderful grounds an the amazing history, but because I have sum beautiful family an friends there. An ho ever keep the grounds do an amazing job.
I loved it here!!It's so serene with immaculately kept gardens and drives.. I loved the swing!!

A beautiful and well kept cemetery park with a lot of history. The Chapel is beautiful and has a lot of history all its own. They even have antique roses and goats. Friendly and courteous staff. The centerpiece of this park is definitely the Confederate Section which is the final resting place for over 2200 of our brave soldiers.

Very good "Mexican" food for a chain. Working on the road alot, I have eaten quite a few of these types of places. This place is pretty good over all. You get a good amount of food for the money, and everything I've ordered has been excellent. They have decent lunch prices, but the dinner prices aren't that much more, so usually go with that and take the leftovers.

A+ service! This is by far the best location they have. It's convenient, consistent, and beautiful! The decor is outstanding, from the light fixtures to the metal mariachi band. Definitely will return again and again and again!

La Carreta is a Lynchburg area staple.  With several locations, this Timberlake Rd location is among (if not) the newest, and is certainly the most desirable atmosphere.  With a full bar and Mexican motif, the entire restaurant - inside and out - makes you feel like you are somewhere special.  The food is always delicious and affordable.  This is the kind of place you could have a date, bring the whole family, or celebrate with a group.  The staff is always friendly and attentive.

While not authentic Mexican cuisine, La Carreta is the standard for Mexican food in central Virginia.
Awesome food. They give you chips and salsa with your Carry-out order. Neat decorations. Great lunch prices. They do not skimp!
I love La Carreta. They have added several locations over the years and all of them I've had were good.

Never again!!

Delivery took more than 2 hours.
The "groentenmix" suppose to be tempura vegetables, but contained prawn tempura (my wife is allergic to it) and there was a hair in the Yaki Udong Tori Teriyaki.....

All in all a real disappointment.
Super lekkere sushi, zowel om af te halen of om thuis te laten bezorgen. Regelmatig wat besteld altijd goed. Ze zijn snel!

Wij bestellen, of halen altijd af bij sakura als we thuis sushi gaan eten. Elke keer opnieuw weer top service. Sushi smaakt ons elke keer weer voortreffelijk en altijd z'n 45 min bezorgtijd. Zelfs vandaag op 2e kerstdag, wanneer er iets mis ging met onze bestelling, kregen we netjes een nieuw product. (Terwijl dit niet nodig was!) Het is dat ik nooit cash in huis heb, anders had ik zeker wat fooi als bedankje erbij gedaan! (Sorry daarvoor 🙈) Tot de volgende bestelling :)
Goede sushi kwaliteit. Stond op tijd klaar. Minpunt dat een blikje drinken niet was meegeleverd.
De beste sushi van Apeldoorn en heel veel keus in wat je wilt eten. Komen wel altijd later bezorgen dan je besteld en dat is wel teleurstellend. Maar heerlijk!

"Santos" was our waiter on 4/4/19. This was our first time visiting and I have to say, going in I did not know we would be treated with such class. I have paid more for meals and most were far less formal than this was. Santos, greeted us immediately after we were seated and told us in great detail about the specials they had that evening. Very knowledgeable. The food was INCREDIBLE. I have been to many nice restaurants up and down the east coast and this by far was the best food I have every had. Prices were around $30 an entree but WELL worth it. I had the 16 ounce rib eye and my wife had the scallops. We also got a side of smoked Mac n Cheese with bacon and a Cheese and Meat appetizer. Both I must say everyone needs to try. In between each course of the meal our waiter would wipe the table off and bring us fresh silverware. We finished up the evening with creme brulee and a double chocolate cake. My wife's birthday evening could not have gone any better and we were left with an incredible first impression about the place. We have already told many a family and friend about Shoemakers and our experience and we can not wait for our next visit. Go in and ask for Santos!

We had a wonderful experience the day after Valentine's. Everything was delicious, the service was great, and the atmosphere is cool. High priced but I suppose that's just fine dining. Try the salmon. Best fish I've ever had. I was a little disappointed in the beer selection on tap it was still adequate. For a special occasion you can't do much better than Shoemakers.
Great atmosphere, they handle events very well. The staff is always friendly

Shoemakers is quite the experience! While there is not a "dress code" that I know of, Shoemakers is a classy establishment to say the least. Each course is brought out in due time, with a change of utensils (ie: a serrated knife is added right before the main course is served). They never rush you & the wait staff is a dream, every time. If you are looking for quick eats, move on. But if you are looking for a truly special dinner experience, head over to Shoemakers!
Great service and amazing food! They have the best steak I have EVER eaten. Hands down.
Worth seeing while at Bryce Canyon. No hiking require. Just park your car and walk 100 to 300 feet depending what parking space is available.

Been here, done that ... want more
If you have not been here ... GO HERE IMMEDIATELY .... WOW ... this place takes your breath away.

I can not go back fast enough.

To save time on all the places up here to review ... they are all 5 ... do them all and take your time and enjoy it.
Cool place. Buts not really a bridge. It's an arch
This pace was so cool. Come here to see the natural Bridge! You're really not expecting it down the canyon wall and then bam--there it is! Awesome!
Just a beautiful view with color painted constant changes. Is a must see oic you are anyplace neat.  That whole entire area Bryce Cayon included is a sight to see.
